title: Rita Ora and Charles Hamilton Interview
itunes:title: Rita Ora and Charles Hamilton Interview
description:
Rita Ora and Charles Hamilton stop through to discuss working together, how they got their music on Empire, Rita's upcoming US debut album, Charles social and mental issues and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
